FuncDef: The license verify command verifies the license file of the device. The license verify command verifies the license file of the device.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the license file to be verified.
The value is a string of 5 to 127 characters. It cannot contain spaces. The file name extension must be .dat, .zip, or .xml. The actual file name extension depends on the license file that is applied for.

ExtraInfo: To verify the license file of the device, run the license verify command. The verification result can be:
